column2: food was just ok. I had the HRW menu. The tuna appetizer was delicious.  The short rib hash was weirdly sweet and too saucy. Not good. The peach "cobbler" lacked sugar and had no real crust -just a dry crumble on top.  I tried the signature Bosscat drink. It was ok
column3: but overpriced at $14.  The concept of this place is cool
column4: but execution is lacking as far as the food is concerned.
